description:
Ferrothorn, known as the Thorn Pod Pok√©mon resembling a flattened durian made of metal. The green spike is found in Ferrothorn`s top,extending three vine-like apandages tipped with spiky metal discs. Its eyes have green rims, yellow scleras and black pupils.
In the anime, Ash`s rival Cameron used Ferrothorn against Marlon. He later calls upon it during his match with Ash.
name: Nutrey
